channel.title: Allstar client?
channel.description: Im currently coding a server called Velo-City and im using allstar source. ( i know its trashy but its a good base to edit up) does anyone know a non-nulled client for it? or maybe how to fix nulled items on teh-noobscape client?

item.title: Allstar client?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Find out which item is missing, then if the client has the model but a different id, just change the id on the server, i’d guess. Or just add a new model to the client:

Get the .gz model.

Add the ints in item8.java (Some premade models come with them)

log into the client and type

add models

or add model (model id)

depending on your client.

then restart client and enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar client?
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

[quote=“Owner Nader, post:4, topic:279511”][quote author=pacman89012 link=topic=368860.msg2792743#msg2792743 date=1242878983]
does anyone know a non-nulled client for it? or maybe how to fix nulled items on teh-noobscape client?
[/quote] Hmm… no and none client go no nulls… all client’s got nulls.[/quote]

I’m pretty sure there if you edit the client a bit it is possible to remove the nulls, I’m trying to find out a way myself

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar client?
item.dc:creator: @pacman89012 pacman89012
item.description:
@pacman89012 wrote:

i know ppl use silab client but i need one for my server. im wondering if someone knows a switch statement for a client to include all 317s in it.

Read full topic
